name: PARLOR BAGATELLE
description:
A historically accurate digital recreation of the 1871 classic pub game by Montague Redgrave.

Created using the Unreal Engine 4: How to Develop Your First Two Games course available from Udemy. Approved by Epic Games and taught by Unreal Engine Evangelist Chris Murphy.

This project is a work in progress & will receive updates, please report any bugs that you may encounter.
